snippet.title: Novatron gameplay (PC Game, 1982)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Novatron, Dos PC game produced by VeriSoft Works in 1982 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/novatron/4205/
Novatron is a pretty nice, conversion of an arcade game. Your objective is to make the computer smash into his or your trail of light, thereby winning the round.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Syndicate - https://youtu.be/pu_2DuAgR2E
Boxer Rebellion - https://youtu.be/VUvzguB9hWk
Grime - https://youtu.be/MZZTZVYAKO4
